Name: Double Bubble Blaster Madness VR
About the game: Double Bubble Blaster Madness is a fast paced puzzle game where you find yourself in a room full of bubbles and must pop them by matching bubbles of the same color together. Once the room is cleared, you will move to the next stage. As a round progresses, the balls get closer. If they get too close, you lose the round. Combos can knock the balls backwards to give you more time to finish the round. Sometimes, powerups will pop up that add custom abilities to your bubble blasters, such as the rapid fire ability if you pick up a machine gun powerup. See how far you can get and compete on the global steam leaderboards. If you like fast paced puzzle arcade games that progressively get harder as you play, this might be the game for you.
